summary: Adds 7 new war paints to females, and 3 hi-res vanilla war paints.
descriptionHtml:
Warpaint V1

By LETHALrunzXBL

_____________________________

Adds 7 new War Paints and 3 high-res vanilla war paints to TESV : Skyrim

Replaces vanilla War paint

All files are 2048x2048 .dds files

EDIT : I have included a .rar with 512x512 sized textures, for those experiencing issues with blockiness etc.

.rar contains 10 .dds files in the correct folder, most of this description in a .txt file, and the image.

_____________________________

: INSTALLATION :
 - Extract folder from .rar file
 - Place \"Textures\" folder into the C:\\Program Files (x86)\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data
 - Let your PC/Mac merge folders and replace files
 - Play Skyrim

____________________________

: UNINSTALLATION :
 - Delete all \"femaleheadwarpaint_##\" .dds files

____________________________

: PERMISSIONS :
 - You can use this mod without my permission, as long as you acknowledge me for it.

____________________________

Download, endorse and comment if you like the war paints, if you don\'t, tell me why, how you think I can fix/change it and we\'ll see what happens.

If you want a war paint design made or changed, but don\'t know how, can\'t, or lack the effort to make one, feel free to ask.
author: LETHALrunzXBL
